description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows USB Video Class system driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43449):

1. Identify the appropriate KB articles for your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: Apply KB5046617
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: Apply KB5046633
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: Apply KB5046633
   - For Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: Apply KB5046665
   - For Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems: Apply KB5046665
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: Apply KB5046613
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: Apply KB5046613

2. Download and install the corresponding updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - KB5046617: [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
   - KB5046633: [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
   - KB5046665: [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046665)
   - KB5046613: [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613)

3. Restart your computer after the installation to ensure that all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update mitigates an elevation of privilege vulnerability that could potentially allow an attacker to gain access to sensitive system resources.
- Ensure you verify your Windows build number before applying the updates.
- Backup your system data prior to installation to avoid any loss.
